caption.center: COMMONWEALTH OF PENNSYLVANIA, Respondent v. WILLIS HERDER, Petitioner.

court.center: Supreme Court of Pennsylvania, Middle District.

opinion.posture: No. 513 MAL 2003, Petition for Allowance of Appeal from the Order of the Superior Court.
opinion.opinion_text: AND NOW, this 6th day of April, 2004, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is hereby DENIED.
